item.title: todo
item.description: What can be learned here: the use of <fx-repeat> element data binding and resolution using a constraint using controls using insert and delete action Todo Application Let’s go for a bit more fancy example and learn about some new elements. In this tutorial we add some real interaction, give some feedback messages to the user and actually change our data. It will introduce you to <fx-repeat> element that is one of the container elements available in Fore.

item.title: todo refined
item.description: What can be learned here: adding a counter insert from a template node use <fx-bind> to require an value Todo refined In last chapter the bare minimum for the todo app were created. In this chapter we’d like to make some improvements: show a counter for our todos hide or show completed todos make sure we can handle an empty list Extending our data model Let’s add a couple of nodes to our data model to cover our objectives.
